Description: Dagger: bronze blade attached to bone handle by rivets.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Kerma (Nubia), Tumulus K IV, K. 425.
Curator's comments: Published: W.V.Davies (ed) Egypt and Africa (1991) [PL.13.2]. Reisner, Kerma I-III, p. 216; 13-12-779.
Exhibition history: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2022 27 April – 25 July, Paris, Musée du Louvre, Pharaoh of the Two Lands
